document.full_text: the concert production of "camelot," which also stars james barbour as lancelot and melissa errico as guenevere, will be presented at the shubert theater on june 6 as a benefit for the irish repertory theater.
document.title: fie on badness! jeremy irons to play king arthur for one night
lines_and_colors: the concert production of "camelot," which also stars james barbour as lancelot and melissa errico as guenevere, will be presented at the shubert theater on june 6 as a benefit for the irish repertory theater.
